"Divide Quests":
"Divide Quests are a VR training program that simulates battling against Luminmechs and Photoners in various environments.

In addition to known Luminmech models, Xiao has used the data acquired from infiltrating the large enemy battleship to calculate what kinds of giant Luminmech may appear in the future.
When you complete Divide Quests, you will earn Divide Points. You will earn rewards based on the number of points you have obtained.
